entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this evening. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 6:29 PM EDT Friday 5 May 2023
